findings.insight: GCDs are the binding constraint, not fury or fragments
findings.evidence: Economy model: fury surplus ~100-200/min (generation 200-300, spending 100-200), fragment surplus ~12-24/min. Fragment overflow 34% (17/50 in 30s). Both resources over-produced — GCD allocation is what determines DPS. Priority optimization must focus on which abilities get GCDs, not resource management.

findings.insight: Dynamic SBomb threshold during Fiery Demise: 3 for AR, 5 default
findings.evidence: Fiery Demise +30% fire amp makes 3-frag SBomb worthwhile: 3×base×1.3=3.9×base > 5×base×0.78 break-even. +0.181% weighted (AR +0.297%, Anni -0.184% noise). Confirmed at standard fidelity. Does NOT help Anni — Voidfall cycle already handles SBomb timing, and Anni SBomb threshold=3 regresses worst archetype -1.19%.

findings.insight: Voidfall fury pooling threshold: 70 confirmed better than 105
findings.evidence: Iteration #5: Relaxing fury guard from 105→70 before building→spending transition: +0.198% weighted (AR +0.221%, Anni +0.127%). Natural fury gen during spending phase covers the 3rd Soul Cleave — 70 fury is sufficient for 2 upfront + natural gen for 3rd.

findings.insight: AR AoE was missing empowered cycle call and Brand window call
findings.evidence: Iteration #1 (+0.163%) and #9 (+0.105%): ar_aoe sub-list was missing call_action_list,name=ar_empowered (skipping entire hero tree mechanic in AoE) and call_action_list,name=ar_brand_window (no Brand extension during AoE). Combined +0.27% weighted.

findings.insight: Anni Voidfall SBomb missing fragment guard — bug fix
findings.evidence: Iteration #2 (+0.185%): spirit_bomb in Voidfall spending was missing soul_fragments>=spb_threshold guard, could fire with insufficient fragments. Adding the guard: AR +0.183%, Anni +0.192%.

findings.insight: Fragment overflow is 34% — structural waste, not fixable by APL
findings.evidence: Combat log analysis: 17 of 50 fragment creation events overflow in 30s (AR actor). Fragment cap is 6, auto-consume on travel (85% pickup chance, ~1s travel time) means fragments rarely accumulate to 5+ active simultaneously. This is inherent to the mechanic, not an APL deficiency.

findings.insight: Untethered Rage proc rate nerfed to ~3.75% per SBomb
findings.evidence: SimC upstream commit: formula changed from 0.1*(1+stack_value)*souls to souls*0.0075*1.35^seething_anger_up. At 5 souls consumed with seething_anger_up=1: 5*0.0075*1.35 = 5.06% per cast. Previous rate was ~50%. UR Meta condition in APL line 40 is now near-dead code but removing it showed no significant change.

findings.insight: Voidfall fury pooling (fury>=105 guard) needs confirm-fidelity validation
findings.evidence: Added fury>=105 guard before building→spending transition. SUPERSEDED: Iteration #5 confirmed fury>=70 is optimal (+0.198% weighted). See 2026-02-06 finding 'Voidfall fury pooling threshold: 70 confirmed better than 105'.

findings.insight: Knowledge system helps prevent wasted analysis — check mechanics.json first
findings.evidence: Session discovered AR empowerment 'fix' was based on incorrect mechanical analysis. Had mechanics.json existed with correct fall-through behavior documentation, the false positive would have been caught before implementation.

findings.insight: Spirit Bomb threshold 5 optimal, supersedes 3/4/5 noise claim
findings.evidence: +0.21% weighted at confirm fidelity (ST +0.36%, 10T +0.44%, 5T -0.20%). Threshold 3 is -0.51% (5T: -1.50%), threshold 6 is -0.95%. Sweet spot confirmed at 5.

findings.insight: call_action_list has zero overhead vs inline actions
findings.evidence: Flat AR list (all actions inline) vs sub-list structure: -0.01% weighted at confirm fidelity. No performance difference.

findings.insight: FelDev before Brand is a loss — Brand-first CD ordering critical
findings.evidence: FelDev above cooldowns: -0.58% weighted, -1.18% ST. 2s channel delays FD window opening.

findings.insight: Holding CDs for Fiery Demise window costs more than it gains
findings.evidence: Adding Brand-alignment conditions (hold <=15s) to Spite/FelDev: -0.32% weighted. Delayed casts outweigh the +30% FD bonus.

findings.insight: Brand-Meta alignment (holding Brand for Meta) is a loss
findings.evidence: Brand hold <=5s for Meta: -0.45% weighted, -0.96% ST. FD window value exceeds Meta overlap bonus.

findings.insight: SC consuming fragments before SBomb threshold catastrophic in AoE
findings.evidence: SC Fury dump at fury>=100 before Fracture: -2.70% at 10T. Fragment consumption prevents SBomb pooling.

findings.insight: 5 talent swaps yield +8-10% DPS across all scenarios
findings.evidence: Adding Down in Flames, Soul Carver, Darkglare Boon, Soulcrush, Ascending Flame while dropping Last Resort, Calcified Spikes, Feed the Demon, Stoke the Flames, and reducing Charred Flesh to rank 1: ST +8.0% (29218→31555), 5T +10.3% (91978→101451), 10T +10.0% (163116→179395).

findings.insight: 2-charge Fiery Brand condition gains only +0.07% weighted
findings.evidence: With Down in Flames (2 charges, 48s CD), using charges>=2|!dot.ticking instead of !dot.ticking: +0.22% at 10T, negligible ST/5T. The old 1-charge condition already works well because 48s CD means Brand is usually available when dot expires.

findings.insight: Soul Carver FD gate is free with 2-charge Brand
findings.evidence: Removing FD gate from Soul Carver: +0.02% weighted at confirm fidelity. With 2 Brand charges providing ~40-50% FD uptime, the gate barely delays Soul Carver casts.

findings.insight: Soulcrush does not change optimal Spirit Bomb threshold
findings.evidence: SBomb threshold 4 vs 5 with Soulcrush (doubled Frailty): -0.01% weighted, within noise. Threshold 5 remains optimal.

findings.insight: Spec tree has zero slack for DPS-neutral drops beyond 2 points in S3
findings.evidence: Gate constraint (S1+S2 >= 20 points) forces at least 3 drops from Section 3, where only Last Resort has zero DPS value. Stoke the Flames and Charred Flesh rank were the lowest-impact available S3 drops.

findings.insight: DoE factor impacts are population averages, not swap-equivalent values
findings.evidence: Fallout shows -3.17% DoE impact but removing it causes -4.37% weighted regression. DoE measures average effect across all test builds (some without SBomb). In a SBomb build, Fallout is critical for AoE fragment economy.

findings.insight: Current APL is near local optimum for the co-optimized build
findings.evidence: 9 consecutive rejections across APL changes (IA priority, SoF priority, FelDev ungating) and build swaps (Retal+FF). No significant improvement found. PARTIALLY SUPERSEDED: 2026-02-06 deep analysis found +0.18% via dynamic SBomb threshold during FD. But the plateau was real for the approaches tested — surface-level analysis exhausted the obvious moves.

findings.insight: Anni Meta building guard wastes cooldown — allow Meta during building phase
findings.evidence: Mass Acceleration overwrites building stacks. Removing building guard contributes to +2.85% weighted (part of combined condition changes)

findings.insight: Anni FelDev should not channel during Voidfall spending phase
findings.evidence: Channeling wastes meteor triggers from Soul Cleave/SBomb. Part of +2.85% weighted combined condition changes

findings.insight: Anni missing Felblade and ImmAura filler — massive bug
findings.evidence: Adding Felblade + ImmAura filler to Anni branch: +4.38% weighted on top build (CF+DiF+SC+FO), +12.30% on FO-only build

findings.insight: Anni static SBomb threshold 5 better than dynamic 3/5
findings.evidence: Part of +2.85% weighted combined condition changes. Dynamic 3 during Brand was too eager — wasting fragments on small SBombs

findings.insight: Combined Anni APL fixes: +7.35% weighted on top build, +15.82% on FO-only
findings.evidence: Multi-build comparison: baseline (28,897 ST) vs optimized (32,098 ST) for CF+DiF+SC+FO build. AR unaffected (+0.15%)

findings.insight: Anni_CF_DiF_SC_FO is best Anni archetype — all 4 defining talents
findings.evidence: Weighted DPS 112,044 vs next best 106,900 (CF+DiF+SC). Tested across 7 archetypes with valid 34/34 builds

findings.insight: Meta bug: Meta in default list fires before hero tree routing
findings.evidence: Reference APL has Meta inside each hero branch, not in default. For Anni, premature Meta wastes Voidfall stacks. Fixed by moving to per-branch. AR unchanged after fix.

findings.insight: Fracture overflow guard costs DPS
findings.evidence: +10.4% DPS without fragment overflow guard on Fracture in ST

findings.insight: Sigil of Spite fragment guard too restrictive at <=3
findings.evidence: +0.3% DPS with soul_fragments<=5 vs soul_fragments<=3

findings.insight: Spirit Bomb pooling (guarding Soul Cleave to save fragments) hurts DPS
findings.evidence: -1.3% to -2.8% DPS when restricting Soul Cleave to preserve fragments for Spirit Bomb

findings.insight: Meta-priority Fracture (extra fragment generation during Metamorphosis) gains DPS
findings.evidence: +5.2% DPS when prioritizing Fracture during Meta for the extra fragment

findings.insight: Fiery Brand-first cooldown ordering gains DPS
findings.evidence: +0.6% DPS when Fiery Brand fires before other cooldowns to establish the damage amp window
